Posts.Content: Hey Lynn, Just wondering how you're doing. Haven't seen you post in a while. I'm having my surgery on Wed 15th(to remove cysts with atypical cells. I'll keep ya posted on what happens. Hope you're doing well. Take care.
Posts.Title: results of excisional biopsy...not what I expected

Posts.Content: Hi Lynn, I'm sorry about your results. Hang in there. I was on the fence about getting my atypical cell/cysts removed until I read your post this morning. Now I'm definately going through with it. Who knows what they might find and it's best to get it early like you. Thanks for the inspiration. Be well. I'll keep you posted on my experience.
Posts.Title: results of excisional biopsy...not what I expected
